page.title: 07CUSTOMS2 SONG/DANCE
page.content: 1.The{Allez boys song.}The dance is in line with partners like a folk dance.The words have actions:(CHORUS)Allez boys ,Allez boys dancing on the green, Allez boy,Allez boys God save the Queen. Mary made a pudding.She made it very neat.She daren't stick the fork in for fear it was too sweet.(CHORUS)Johnny won't you have a bit .Don't Say "Nay".Have a bit and save a bit 'til next wedding day.(CHORUS) He huddled her and cuddled her and her on his knee and said, "My pretty darling,what shall we have for tea?" (CHORUS) A tiny cup and saucer ,a guinea golden ring,a plate to put the pudding on. Ding,Dong,Ding. (CHORUS)
